Export the full-year report in `View`-`Report` to see how much time has been recorded this year

Also, let me promote that the steam version is on sale. If you are interestedğŸ˜, go [here](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3026040/shion/)

Next, I want to say something very important, that is, this software has a setting of **Auto start**, yes, that's it.
